The Cell, like Antz, must be watched twice to be appreciated. Once in 2D and once in 3D which is included on the DVD. I loved this movie! It was all I could do not to break down into tears while watching it, but it is really very uplifting. I was struck by the great work done by the various actors and actresses. The story was as compelling as it was sad and even though the group of men eventually found common ground, my heart was tormented because I knew of the terrible things that were to come. I think all people should be required to see this movie.

A teen-aged girl gets the horse of her dreams and is trained by an ex-Jockey to participate in London's Grand National Steeplechase. Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century.
